title: 获得时间应对提问
description: 接到提问后，争取思考时间的表达

questions.chinese: 这个问题问得好，我来详细说
questions.english: That’s an excellent question—let me elaborate.

questions.chinese: 感谢提问，我们来拆解一下
questions.english: I appreciate the question; let’s break it down.

questions.chinese: 我来专门解答这个问题
questions.english: Let me address that point specifically.
